name: Jumpy Ball Happy Fun Time
description:
In "Jumpy Ball Happy Fun Time" you play as a 2 Dimensional being in the shape of a ball, you must traverse the world and overcome obstacles. Along with the 2d platformer experience the game also has a top-down aspect.

Includes 10 unique levels along with 10 challenges.


Features:

- Ball
- 2D Ball
- 2D Game
- Play as Ball
